name: Three Goblin Wobblin'
storyline:
Three goblins have had enough of the intolerant society they are surrounded by. They have devised a brilliant plan to infiltrate sanctuaries of human indulgence, to fight for change... by getting drunk.

Goblin legends tell of a beverage devised by ever-inventive humans, hidden away in their taprooms. They call it "beer"!
You must help these three goblins intrude on human festivities and snatch a mug of this legendary drink.
summary: Goblins are prohibited from entering a local tavern, but luckily, they hatched a cunning plan. Move and balance the three goblins to help them quench their thirst and end goblin discrimination in this cute casual wobbling simulator.
